fields.title: Harris 1988 Minneapolis-St. Paul Health Plans Survey, study no. 881009

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue: This is a survey of employer health benefits managers in the Minneapolis-St. Paul area which tapped their views about the importance of various features of health plans, ratings of current health plans, and those they planned to drop.

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: The sample was drawn from the 692 organizations with the largest number of employees in the 7 county area. Respondents were interviewed by telephone.; The universe consisted of all public and private corporations having at least 75 employees in the following seven counties in the Minneapolis-St. Paul area: Ramsey, Washington, Dakota, Hennepin, Anoka, Scott, or Carver.; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:CODEBOOK.NUMBER  Notes: H-881009;

distributor.distributorName: Odum Institute for Research in Social Science
